events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I don't need this product.
System identified the issue as refund-related based on customer's message mentioning refund request due to incorrect item.
Support case assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let’s get this sorted quickly for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and expedite your refund?
Here is the order number 458392 and attached is the photo showing the incorrect product I received in my delivery.
Thank you for the details. I will process a full refund for your order and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund and return label solution. Looking forward to the confirmation.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return label email has been sent. Please let us know if you need further help.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and the return label without any issues. Please reach out if there's anything else.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing this case. Thanks for contacting support, and have a great day!
